column2:
glm(formula = state3 ~ backers, family = "binomial", data = subset(data.train, 
    backers < 1000))
Null deviance: 7204.1  on 6689  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 3609.5  on 6688  degrees of freedom

ggplot(subset(data.train,backers<1000 & main_category %in% c('Comics', 'Crafts', 'Film & Video', 'Games')),aes(x=backers,y=state3))+geom_point()+stat_smooth(method="glm", method.args=list(family="binomial"), se=FALSE)
